channel.title: Project-Nex [667/716]
channel.description:
[b][u][size=18pt]Welcome to the development thread of Project-Nex[/size][/u][/b]
[url=http://project-nex.com/home][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7122/6909626856_266ab79d8e_b.jpg[/img][/url]
Ok, to start off. This is what we've done this far.
[ol][li] Summoning 100%[/li] [li] Donator system 100%[/li] [li] Vote system 80% (needs to be changed from vote4points to vote4cash or needs[/li] [li] Hiscores 99% ( just needs admins not to be in the hiscores)[/li] [li] Changed home[/li] [li] Added some shops(working on so much more)[/li] [li] Godwars[/li] [li] Nice looking website(ruby's template)[/li] [li] Added donator shops[/li] [li] Added donator armour(just renamed)[/li] [li] Added project-nex armour(just renamed)[/li] [li] Made fishing training area[/li] [li] Made thieving train area[/li] [li] Made shops area[/li] [li] Made combat training area[/li] [li] Made mandrith give you skill levels for untrainable skills(there will be no untrainable skills soon. [/li] [li] Made staffzone :D[/li] [li] Fixed trade[/li][/ol]
so what we are planning to do:
[ol][li]Adding 100% hunter[/li] [li]100% slayer[/li] [li]Adding bout 30-40 more shops[/li] [li]Changing spot of combat training[/li] [li]Making slayer area[/li] [li]Making hunter area[/li][/ol]
So now comes the media:
[img]http://project-nex.com/upload/upload/1.jpg[/img] [img]http://project-nex.com/upload/upload/2.jpg[/img] [img]http://project-nex.com/upload/upload/3.jpg[/img] [img]http://project-nex.com/upload/upload/4.jpg[/img] [img]http://project-nex.com/upload/upload/5.jpg[/img] [img]http://project-nex.com/upload/upload/6.jpg[/img]
so now the applying forms:
Server coder:
experience in java: experience in RSPS: experience in teamwork: //copy this too : server
client coder: experience in java: experience in RSPS: experience in teamwork: //copy this too : client
Forum developer: experience in website building: experience in RSPS: experience in teamwork: experience in keeping a forum good: //copy this too : forum
Website developer experience in website building: experience in RSPS: experience in teamwork: experience in php/mysql/html: //copy this too : website
thanks for watching and i hope you join soon [s]click on the banner[/s]
grtz Mickie456 owner of Project-Nex

item.title: Project-Nex [667/716]
item.dc:creator: @mickie456 mickie456
item.description:
@mickie456 wrote:

[quote=“Cowarooroo, post:10, topic:444617”]experience in website building: Made forums many times before, I enjoy managing them as I am usually on a servers forums more than the server
experience in RSPS: 4-5 Years On & Off
experience in teamwork: Like to collaborate with other staff and make lists of Need to Do’s
experience in keeping a forum good: Keep the assholes in line, and stay organized.
//copy this too : forum

experience in java: Made a few servers over the past few years
experience in RSPS: 4-5 Years On & Off
experience in teamwork: LISTS
//copy this too : server[/quote]

add mickie6503 on skype bro

Ok, to start off. This is what we’ve done this far.
